author: Douglas Belkin
title: Missouri Legislature Weighs Next Move on Gov. Eric Greitens
text:
Republicans in the Missouri legislature are weighing the political fate of Gov. Eric Greitens, following his indictment by a St. Louis grand jury for alleged invasion of privacy stemming from a 2015 extramarital affair.
The indictment on Thursday, announced by City of St. Louis Circuit Attorney Kimberly Gardner, a Democrat, came amid an investigation launched by her office after reports that the Republican governor had threatened to release nude photos of a former mistress if she disclosed the affair.
...
